verses.verse: So <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogies;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> into <S%H1540>exile<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%> for their <S%H4604>unfaithfulness.<s%>

Now the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their <S%H272>possessions<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%> [were] <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> and the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants.<s%>

And <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

<S%H5793>Uthai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H566>Imri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1137>Bani,<s%> from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
And from the <S%H7888>Shilonites<s%> [were] <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the first-born and his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>
And from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> [were] <S%H3262>Jeuel<s%> and their <S%H251>relatives,<s%> 690 [of them.]

And from the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> [were] <S%H9365>Sallu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1938>Hodaviah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5574>Hassenuah,<s%>

and <S%H2997>Ibneiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> and <S%H425>Elah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5813>Uzzi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4381>Michri,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2998>Ibnijah;<s%>

and their <S%H251>relatives<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> 956. <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] according to their fathers' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
And from the <S%H3548>priests<s%> [were] <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> <S%H3080>Jehoiarib,<s%> <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%>

and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4812>Meraioth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> the <S%H5057>chief<s%> <S%H5057>officer<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%>

and <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3395>Jeroham,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashhur,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> and <S%H4640>Maasai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5717>Adiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3170>Jahzerah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemith,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer;<s%>

and their <S%H251>relatives,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> 1760 very <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> [were] <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2815>Hasshub,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5840>Azrikam,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2811>Hashabiah,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%>

and <S%H1230>Bakbakkar,<s%> <S%H2792>Heresh<s%> and <S%H1559>Galal<s%> and <S%H4983>Mattaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4316>Mica,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%>

and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1559>Galal,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun,<s%> and <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H609>Asa,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H511>Elkanah,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H9161>villages<s%> of the <S%H5200>Netophathites.<s%>

Now the <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> [were] <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> and <S%H6126>Akkub<s%> and <S%H2929>Talmon<s%> and <S%H289>Ahiman<s%> and their <S%H251>relatives<s%> <S%H7967>(Shallum<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>

[being stationed] <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2008>now<s%> at the king's <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H4217>east<s%>). <S%H1992>These<s%> [were] the <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> for the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6981>Kore,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H43>Ebiasaph,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and his <S%H251>relatives,<s%> of his father's <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H7145>Korahites,<s%> [were] <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service,<s%> <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> of the <S%H168>tent;<s%> and their fathers had been <S%H1>over<s%> the <S%H5921>camp<s%> of the <S%H4264>Lord,<s%> <S%H3068>keepers<s%> of the <S%H8104>entrance.<s%>
And <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> was <S%H5057>ruler<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H6440>previously,<s%> [and] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with him.
<S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4920>Meshelemiah<s%> was <S%H7778>gatekeeper<s%> of the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> these who were <S%H1305>chosen<s%> to be <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> in the <S%H5592>thresholds<s%> were 212. <S%H1992>These<s%> were <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> in their <S%H9161>villages,<s%> <S%H1992>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H9536>seer<s%> <S%H3245>appointed<s%> in their office of <S%H530>trust.<s%>

So they and their <S%H1121>sons<s%> had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [even] the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> as <S%H4931>guards.<s%>
The <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> were on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>sides,<s%> to the <S%H4217>east,<s%> <S%H3220>west,<s%> <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H5045>south.<s%>
And their <S%H251>relatives<s%> in their <S%H9161>villages<s%> [were] to <S%H935>come<s%> in every <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> [to be] with them;

for the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5057>chief<s%> <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> [were] <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> were in an office of <S%H530>trust,<s%> and were <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And they <S%H3885>spent<s%> the <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4931>watch<s%> was <S%H5921>committed<s%> to them; and they [were] in <S%H5921>charge<s%> of <S%H4668>opening<s%> [it] <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Now <S%H4480>some<s%> of them had <S%H5921>charge<s%> of the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of <S%H5656>service,<s%> for they <S%H4557>counted<s%> them when they <S%H935>brought<s%> them in and when they <S%H3318>took<s%> them out.

<S%H4480>Some<s%> of them also were <S%H4487>appointed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3627>furniture<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>utensils<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> and the <S%H3196>wine<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> and the <S%H1314>spices.<s%>
And <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7543>prepared<s%> the <S%H4842>mixing<s%> of the <S%H1314>spices.<s%>

And <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> one of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> was the first-born of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H7145>Korahite,<s%> had the <S%H530>responsibility<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4639>things<s%> which were <S%H2281>baked<s%> in <S%H2281>pans.<s%>

And <S%H4480>some<s%> of their <S%H251>relatives<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> [were] <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3899>showbread<s%> <S%H4635><s%> to <S%H3559>prepare<s%> it <S%H7676>every<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> [who lived] in the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> [of the temple] <S%H6362>free<s%> [from other service;] for they were <S%H5921>engaged<s%> in their <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H7218>men,<s%> <S%H428>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
And in <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H3262>Jeiel<s%> the father of <S%H1>Gibeon<s%> <S%H1391>lived,<s%> and his wife's <S%H3427>name<s%> was <S%H8034>Maacah,<s%>
and his first-born <S%H1121>son<s%> [was] <S%H5658>Abdon,<s%> then <S%H6698>Zur,<s%> <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> <S%H9058>Baal,<s%> <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab,<s%>
<S%H1446>Gedor,<s%> <S%H283>Ahio,<s%> <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H4732>Mikloth.<s%>

And <S%H4732>Mikloth<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H8043>Shimeam.<s%> And they <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> with their <S%H251>relatives<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> their [other] <S%H251>relatives.<s%>

And <S%H5369>Ner<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%> Malchi-shua, <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and <S%H792>Eshbaal.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> [was] Merib-baal; and Merib-baal <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4318>Micah<s%> [were] <S%H6377>Pithon,<s%> <S%H4429>Melech,<s%> <S%H8475>Tahrea,<s%> [and Ahaz.]

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3294>Jarah,<s%> and <S%H3294>Jarah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5964>Alemeth,<s%> <S%H5820>Azmaveth,<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri;<s%> and <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H4162>Moza,<s%>

and <S%H4162>Moza<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H1150>Binea<s%> and <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H501>Eleasah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H682>Azel<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H682>Azel<s%> had <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are <S%H428>these:<s%> <S%H5840>Azrikam,<s%> <S%H1074>Bocheru<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> and <S%H8187>Sheariah<s%> and <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> and <S%H2605>Hanan.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H682>Azel.<s%>
